tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    app_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    app_id UUID REFERENCES apps(app_id),
    user_id UUID,
    rating INT,
    review_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    app_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    rating INT,
    review_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    app_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE ratings (
    rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    app_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    rating FLOAT,
    date_rated DATE
);
